Class ScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ScoreBoard

public class ScoreBoard
extends greenfoot.Actor

The ScoreBoard is used to display results on the screen. It can display some text and several numbers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
M Kolling
